agricultural-agreement.title: Agricultural Agreement
agricultural-agreement.description: Farm partnerships, crop sharing, or land use agreements. Covers farming operations, costs, and profit sharing.

farm-lease-agreement.title: Farm Lease Agreement
farm-lease-agreement.description: Rent farmland for crops or livestock. Sets rental terms, land use restrictions, and maintenance responsibilities.

crop-sharing-agreement.title: Crop Sharing Agreement
crop-sharing-agreement.description: Split crop profits between landowner and farmer. Fair way to share costs, work, and income from farming.

livestock-purchase-agreement.title: Livestock Purchase Agreement
livestock-purchase-agreement.description: Buy or sell cattle, horses, or other farm animals safely. Covers health guarantees, delivery, and payment terms.

timber-sale-agreement.title: Timber Sale Agreement
timber-sale-agreement.description: Sell trees from your property to lumber companies. Protects your land while getting fair value for timber.

oil-gas-lease.title: Oil Gas Lease
oil-gas-lease.description: Lease your land to oil or gas companies for drilling. Covers royalty payments and land protection requirements.

oil-gas-lease-agreement.title: Oil Gas Lease Agreement
oil-gas-lease-agreement.description: Detailed agreement for oil and gas exploration on your property. Ensures fair compensation and environmental protection.

water-rights-agreement.title: Water Rights Agreement
water-rights-agreement.description: Buy, sell, or share water rights for irrigation or other uses. Important for farming and property development.

mining-agreement.title: Mining Agreement
mining-agreement.description: Allow mining on your property while protecting your interests. Covers compensation, environmental restoration, and access.

mining-lease-agreement.title: Mining Lease Agreement
mining-lease-agreement.description: Lease land for mining operations with detailed terms. Protects property owners and ensures proper land restoration.

tuition-agreement.title: Tuition Agreement
tuition-agreement.description: Set payment terms for private school or college tuition. Protects both families and educational institutions.

tutoring-agreement.title: Tutoring Agreement
tutoring-agreement.description: Hire tutors for academic help with clear expectations. Covers subjects, schedules, payment, and learning goals.

athletic-scholarship-agreement.title: Athletic Scholarship Agreement
athletic-scholarship-agreement.description: Formalize athletic scholarship terms between students and schools. Covers performance expectations and academic requirements.

research-agreement.title: Research Agreement
research-agreement.description: Collaborate on research projects with clear ownership of results. Important for academic and commercial research partnerships.

education-trust.title: Education Trust
education-trust.description: Set aside money for children's education expenses. Tax-advantaged way to save for future college costs.

travel-insurance-agreement.title: Travel Insurance Agreement
travel-insurance-agreement.description: Protect yourself from travel emergencies and cancellations. Covers medical expenses, trip interruptions, and lost luggage.

aviation-charter-agreement.title: Aviation Charter Agreement
aviation-charter-agreement.description: Charter private aircraft for business or personal travel. Sets flight terms, costs, and safety responsibilities.

maritime-charter-agreement.title: Maritime Charter Agreement
maritime-charter-agreement.description: Charter boats or ships for transportation or recreation. Covers crew, insurance, and maritime safety requirements.

hunting-lease-agreement.title: Hunting Lease Agreement
hunting-lease-agreement.description: Lease hunting rights on private property. Sets seasons, fees, safety rules, and property access restrictions.
